author: coldcolgate
content: I'm currently using the eth2spec python lib to generate merkle proofs for the beacon state root.  I've been using a "dummy" state up until now but wanted to know if theres was a way to get the actual beacon state in a usable format

author: potuz
content: you can get it from a debug endpoint `curl -X GET "http://127.0.0.1:3500/eth/v2/debug/beacon/states/finalized" -H "accept: application/octet-stream" --output state.ssz`
